title: Person of Interest (2x18) funny scenes
author: moonwitch
comment:
"Are you the nigerian scammers? I can't believe you're actually nigerian"

always made me laugh everytime
Jim Caviezel is an incredible and probably one of the best out there. Jim please take more roles!

"I need you to tell me the truth about something!!"
" there is no santa. It was your parents."

Damn Lionel😂😂

Lol
Leon Tao is and will always be my favorite number. Lol he's hilarious. 
And John is a total BAMF
After he "talks" with the local mob connections, he just casually turn his back on them to talk to Finch. Lol
I wish there'd been more Leon Tao he was a likeable character and awesomely portrayed by Ken Leung
